title: CLT Airport Download
text: The Charlotte Douglas International Airport app makes your travel experience through CLT easier than ever before. Created with all phases of your journey in mind, the app gives you instant access to all the information you need during every step of your trip, from preparing for travel to boarding your flight.Features:- 48-Hour Flight Tracking with real-time flight status updates. Easily Search, Save and Share your flights to and from CLT. The app includes flight updates and information for all airlines serving CLT.- Shopping, Dining and Relaxation amenities. Enjoy the flexibility of viewing all options or filtering by your preferences.- Indoor Navigation including turn-by-turn directions.- Parking planning utilizing the Real-Time Parking Map.- Travel tips and frequently asked questions regarding travel through CLT, including: Airport Layout, Security, Accessibility, Mothers Rooms and much more.
